thread.title: Paul Elkin
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Paul Elkin

author: Paul Elkin
title: Paul Elkin
text: When I called in yesterday to advise about a problem with a melted battery – caught fire during charging – I thought I would hear back immediately. I know it is only 36 hours, but I still thought I would hear back from customer service before this. I will call customer service tomorrow.
